rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0001
rows.name:
Amazing.
You can see the whole town from here.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0002
rows.name:
What did I tell you?
Pretty great view, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0003
rows.name:
This is the place with
the best view
in Torigo town.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0004
rows.name:
Zeke, you weren't born here,
were you?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0005
rows.name:
...How come you know
so much about this place?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0006
rows.name: Well, actually...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0007
rows.name:
Last time I visited Torigo,
the innkeeper filled me in
on all the details.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0008
rows.name:
Right, you've traveled extensively,
haven't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0009
rows.name:
Do you know other regions as well
as you know Gula?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0010
rows.name:
Oh yeah, I've seen
all kinds of things
in my travels...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0011
rows.name:
Hey, boy...
How does the scenery from here
look to you?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0012
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0013
rows.name: It's a big, beautiful, and lively town.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0014
rows.name: I think I prefer Iyasaki Village.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0101
rows.name: I see... That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0102
rows.name:
But that's just the surface.
It's nothing but a facade.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0103
rows.name: A facade?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0104
rows.name: Yeah, exactly.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0105
rows.name:
As you know,
Gula is a colony of Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0106
rows.name:
The only places that look vibrant
are the towns with Superbian
military bases.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0107
rows.name:
The other towns and villages
in Gula survive through
logging and farming...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0108
rows.name:
And then they export
most of it to Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0109
rows.name:
It's not an easy life.
There are lots of people
who are suffering.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0111
rows.name: And it's not just Gula...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0112
rows.name:
In my travels,
I've witnessed the ugly
side of many nations.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0113
rows.name: ...Didn't you try to help those people?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0114
rows.name: I tried many, many times...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0115
rows.name:
I was convinced I could make
a difference through
my own strength.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0116
rows.name:
But it turned out my fancy title
and sword skills were
absolutely worthless...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0117
rows.name:
My arrogant belief that
I could save the world by myself
was completely shattered.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0118
rows.name: ...That's not true.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0119
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0120
rows.name:
Well, it's not like we can help
everyone in the world
right away.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0121
rows.name:
But there are people
like me and Homura whose lives
you've definitely saved.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0122
rows.name: So, you shouldn't give up.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0123
rows.name:
Plus, now you have friends
you can count on,
don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0124
rows.name: Yeah, you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0125
rows.name: You're absolutely right, boy.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0126
rows.name:
Now I've got dependable
allies at my side...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0127
rows.name:
Things I couldn't do back then
might be possible now.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0128
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0129
rows.name:
So let's keep going forward
and never give up.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0130
rows.name:
Yeah...
I just wasn't fired up enough...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0131
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I'll make the name of Zeke
echo across all of Alst!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0132
rows.name:
Whew! That felt good.
Now it's your turn, Rex!
Let's hear your resolve!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0133
rows.name: Erm...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0134
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ] I'm going to get Homura and Hikari
to Eden!!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0135
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Yeeehaaaa!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0136
rows.name: What are you idiots doing...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0137
rows.name: It's embarrassing...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0201
rows.name:
Iyasaki Village is a peaceful place
that wasn't hit hard by the war,
right?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0202
rows.name: Yeah. That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0203
rows.name:
But not all places in Alst
are so fortunate.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0204
rows.name: ...What do you mean?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0205
rows.name:
Listen, boy.
What you can see is not
the whole truth.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0206
rows.name:
Places might look prosperous on
the surface, but behind that facade,
many people are suffering.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0207
rows.name: ...You mean here in Gula too?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0208
rows.name:
Exactly.
Cities like Torigo with Superbian
military bases are thriving.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0209
rows.name:
But the other towns and
villages in Gula survive
on logging and farming...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0210
rows.name:
And then they export most of it
to Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0211
rows.name:
It's not an easy life.
There are lots of people
who are suffering.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0212
rows.name: And it's not just Gula...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0213
rows.name:
I've seen so many places
like this that it made me
feel completely helpless.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0215
rows.name: Zeke, you aren't powerless.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0216
rows.name:
You have the determination
to help others.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0217
rows.name:
Even now,
you're thinking and worrying about
suffering people...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0218
rows.name: As expected of a future king.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0219
rows.name: Don't make fun of me...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0220
rows.name: I'm being sincere.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0221
rows.name:
I get filled with thoughts
about the people right
in front of me.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0222
rows.name: Homura, Hikari, Gramps, Nia, everyone...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0223
rows.name:
But you care deeply about people
you haven't even met.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0224
rows.name: Even people whose names you don't know...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0225
rows.name:
That's really incredible.
It makes me want to try harder
so I'm not falling behind you.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0226
rows.name:
...Really, boy, you're
refreshingly straightforward.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0227
rows.name:
Though Gramps tells me
to pay more attention
to my surroundings.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0228
rows.name: Don't worry about that.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0229
rows.name:
When you're facing forward,
I'll watch your back.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0230
rows.name: Yeah, I'm counting on you.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0231
rows.name: Leave it to me!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0232
rows.name: Such a wonderful friendship...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0233
rows.name: It makes me want to try harder too.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0234
rows.name:
That's right...
Let's do our best too.
